content.content: auctions.makerdao.com   Surplus Auctions (Beta) - Maker Auctions MakerDAO stakeholders use the Voting Portal to vote on the blockchain. Voting occurs frequently, requiring an active, well-informed governance community.      For the next 25mins or so, there are a lot of opportunities to make money on the FLAP auctions. You can bid using the link above.
content.GPT-summary: The post is advertising a FLAP Auction UI link for MakerDAO stakeholders to bid on the blockchain and make money. The post also extends an opportunity to bid for the next 25 minutes.

content.content: Seems like there was someone who made a contract to bid the smallest amount of MKR in the auctions. getting out with 0.0000000000001 MKR for 30k DAI. Seems like we need to find a solution for this as well. Maybe limit the amount of flap auctions happening at one time?
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: GWintery:  Maybe limit the amount of flap auctions happening at one time?   I think this is a very good idea. There’s no need for us to flood the market with auctions like this. The SB can grow and we can cap the rate at which we make flap auctions.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
